snippet: France’s health minister said the European Union should strengthen its rules on authorizing medical devices amid a breast implant scandal involving a French company.
abstract: France’s health minister Xavier Bertrand says that the European Union should strengthen its rules on authorizing medical devices amid a breast implant scandal involving the French company Poly Implant Prothese.
lead_paragraph: France’s health minister said the European Union should strengthen its rules on authorizing medical devices amid a breast implant scandal involving a French company.

headline.main: France: Call for New Implant Rules
headline.print_headline: France: Call for New Implant Rules
